Description:
A text that informs the player that if they pull the lever they're standing in front of, it will initiate a security scan sequence, and that initiating the scan sequence will trigger an alarm. Do not alter the RichText tags.
{0} is the name of the security scan. Example: Class II Alarm.

French.Translation: Démarrer la séquence d'analyse de sécurité <color=red>[ALERTE :{0} DÉTECTÉE]</color>

Italian.Translation: Avvia sequenza scansione di sicurezza <color=red>[ATTENZIONE:{0} RILEVATO]</color>

Spanish.Translation: Iniciar secuencia de escáner de seguridad <color=red>[AVISO:{0} DETECTADO]</color>

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Iniciar sequência de escaneamento de segurança <color=red>[AVISO:{0} DETECTADO/A]</color>

Japanese.Translation: セキュリティスキャンシークエンス <color=red>を開始[警告:{0} 検知済み]</color>

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 啟動安全掃描序列<color=red>[警告：偵測到{0}]</color>

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 开始安全扫描序列<color=red>[警告：探测到{0}]</color>

name: InGame.InteractionPrompt.SecurityDoor.StartSecurityScan_X
